Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
🔒 Security: Separate public and private information

- Created public README.md (safe for GitHub)
- Moved detailed info to README_PRIVATE.md (Git ignored)
- Updated .gitignore to protect sensitive data
- Added security guide and documentation
- Added Notion sync scripts (public/private separation)
- Added VS Code + Notion integration guide

🤖 Generated with Claude Code

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
